The interface groups the available actions in the following functional areas:
the upper toolbar allows you to switch between working modes and provides quick access to the Undo/Redo buttons, the error list, and the save button
the lower toolbar provides working mode-specific actions
a side panel that, depending on the selected mode, can host the Attributes view, the Review panel, and Actions view.
